div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2055 Carrara (anc. Luna), Etruria, 1860 Burial: c. 80 B.C. (Crawford) Contents: c. 3500 AR. Pot hoard Achaean League: 3 triob. Roman Rep.: c. 3500 vict., den., sest. Disposition: Florence, part. Crawford, RRCH 260 (for previous references)
